question: Analyze the social media presence of companies in the technology sector and their engagement metrics over the last year.

subtasks.task: Identify all companies operating in the technology sector from the CompanyInfo table.

Extract engagement metrics (likes, comments, engagement rates) from the CompanyFacebookDetail, CompanyInstagramDetail, CompanyTwitterDetail, and CompanyYoutubeDetail tables for the identified companies.
Aggregate and analyze the engagement metrics data for insights on performance trends over the last year.
